Articles.Content:
Are there any mods out there geared toward video makers? I'd love to try my hand at one of those (it would ALSO be my FIRST video of that type EVER), I have a storyline in mind, I just need to know what mods to use. heh.

There any way to turn off the hud during flight as well?

Argh, I thought this was the place to put this, move it if it doesn't fit, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Since KSP 0.13.0, the F2 key allows you to show/hide the in-flight UI / HUD.

Not sure exactly what you are looking for, but do any of these look interesting for you?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80112](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80112)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94171)
Those two camera ones were JUST what I was looking for. Have a rep, Blue! Now I gotta learn how to use them effectively.

Thanx...Glad to help...hopefully someone will chime in if there are others out there...

I'm pretty sure there are several more camera parts mods, similar to the Hullcam VDS mod, but I cant remember what they are called right now... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
